charges.charge_description: 21 U.S.C. 486 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCES; 21 U.S.C. 841(a)(1) DISTRIBUTION OF CONTROLLED SUBSTANCES AND POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCES; 21 U.S.C. 843(b) USE OF COMMUNICATION FACILITY TO FACILITATE THE DISTRIBUTION OF CONTROLLED SUBSTANCES.
21 U.S.C. §§ 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(B)(ii) and 846  Conspiracy to Distribute Cocaine, Possession with Intent to Distribute Cocaine(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Indictment dismissed upon motion of the government.
